response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to me, and I believe it would also be a valuable addition to your collection or business. After careful consideration, I propose to sell the product to you at a price of $800,000. This offer reflects a fair compromise between its intrinsic worth and your perceived value, while allowing me to recoup a substantial portion of its cost. I trust this proposal will meet your expectations and aligns with your financial considerations. Should you require any further information or have questions about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 800000}
